projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

Remarks in note elements with the @resp attribute identifying the agency.

lg.l: prajñāmalā sānucarābhidharmaḥ tatprāptaye yāpi ca yacca śāstram /
dharmāṇāṃ pravicayamantareṇa nāsti kleśānāṃ yata upaśāntaye 'bhyupāyaḥ /
kleśaiśca bhramati bhavārṇave 'tra lokastaddhetorata uditaḥ kilaiṣa śāstrā //
duḥkhaṃ samudayo loko dṛṣṭisthānaṃ bhavaśca te //
vijñānaṃ prativijñaptiḥ mana āyatanaṃ ca tat /
dhātavaḥ sapta ca matāḥ ṣaḍ vijñānānyatho mahaḥ //
tau prajñāmānasī vyagrā smṛtiḥ sarvaiva mānasī //
navānupāttā te cāṣṭau śabdaśca anye nava dvidhā //
spraṣṭavyaṃ dvividhaṃ śeṣā rūpiṇo nava bhautikāḥ /
chinatti chidyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātu catuṣṭayam /
na śabdaḥ apratighā aṣṭau naiḥṣyandika vipākajāḥ //
cakṣurvijñānadhātvoḥ syāt pṛthak lābhaḥ sahāpi ca //
sabhāgaḥ tatsabhāgāśca śeṣāḥ yo na svakarmakṛt //
daśa bhāvanayā heyāḥ pañca ca antyāstrayastridhā /
cakṣuḥ paśyati rūpāṇi sabhāgaṃ na tadāśritam /
vijñānaṃ dṛśyate rūpaṃ na kilāntaritaṃ yataḥ //
na kāyasyādharaṃ cakṣuḥ ūrdhvaṃ rūpaṃ na cakṣuṣaḥ /
vijñānaṃ ca asya rūpaṃ tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ //
tathā śrotraṃ trayāṇāṃ tu sarvameva svabhūmikam /
pañca bāhyā divijñeyāḥ nityā dharmā asaṃskṛtāḥ /

body.p: abhidharmakośabhāṣye dhātunirdeśo nāma prathamaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti /

ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //

lg.l: śātā dhyāne tṛtīye tu caitasī sā sukhendriyam //
anyatra sā saumanasyaṃ aśātā caitasī punaḥ /
rūpīṇi jīvitaṃ duḥkhe sāsravāṇi dvidhā nava //
duḥkhe ca hitvā ārūpyāptaṃ sukhe cāpohya rūpi ca //
nava bhavanayā pañca tvaheyānyapi na trayam //
teḥ ṣaḍ vā sapta vā aṣṭau vā ṣaḍ rūpeṣu ekamuttare //
upekṣāṃ caiva rūpe 'ṣṭau kāme daśa navāṣṭau vā //
kramamṛtyau tu catvāri śubhe sarvatra pañca ca /
saumanasyī ca duḥkhī tu saptabhiḥ strīndriyādimān //
vedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśo matiḥ smṛtiḥ /
mūladvayamahiṃsā ca vīryaṃ ca kuśale sadā //
prema śraddhā gurutvaṃ hrīḥ te punaḥ kāmarūpayoḥ //
madaḥ svadharme raktasya paryādānaṃ tu cetasaḥ //
nivṛtasya ca rūpasya kāme rūpasya nāgrajā /
śubhā dvivedyāniyatā ca āryasya āpyā prayogataḥ //
sabhāgatā sā tu punarvipāko 'pi āptayo dvidhā /
caittā dvau saṃvarau teṣāṃ cetaso lakṣaṇāni ca /
varttamānāḥ phalaṃ pañca gṛṇhanti dvau prayacchataḥ /
vipākaṃ sarvagaṃ hitvā tau sabhāgaṃ ca śeṣajāḥ //
catvāraḥ pratyayā uktāḥ hetvākhyaḥ pañca hetavaḥ //
nirudhyamāne kāritraṃ dvau hetū kurutaḥ trayaḥ /
dvidhā bhūtāni taddhetuḥ bhautikasya tu pañcadhā /
kāme nava śubhāccittāccittāni aṣṭābhya eva tat /
aṣṭābhyo nivṛtaṃ tasmāt ṣaṭ tribhyo 'nivṛtaṃ punaḥ /
tasmāt ṣaṭ evāmārūpye tasya nītiḥ śubhātpunaḥ //
nava cittāni tat ṣaṇṇāṃ nivṛtātsapta tattathā /
caturbhyaḥ śaikṣam asmāttu pañca aśaikṣaṃ tu pañcakāt //
kliṣṭe traidhātuke lābhaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dvayoḥ śubhe /
trayāṇāṃ rūpaje śaikṣe caturṇāṃ tasya śeṣite //

body.p:
abhidharmakośe indriyanirddeśo nāma dvitīyaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti /
śrīlāmāvākasya

lg.l: vijñānaṃ na sthitiḥ proktaṃ catuṣkoṭi tu saṃgrahe /
sa bhaviṣyat bhavaphalaṃ kurute karma tat bhavaḥ /
kleśāstrīṇi dvayaṃ karma sapta vastu phalaṃ tathā /
kleśāt kleśaḥ kriyā caiva tato vastu tataḥ punaḥ /
nāma tvarūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ sparśāḥ ṣaṭ saṃnipātajāḥ /
tajjāḥ ṣaḍvedanāḥ pañca kāyikī caitasī parā /
svo 'ṣṭālambanam ārūpyo dvayoḥ dhyānadvaye tu ṣaṭ /
kāmāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ caturṇā svaḥ ekasyālambanaṃ paraḥ //
uktaṃ ca vakṣyate cānyat atra tu kleśā iṣyate /
dvīpāḥ bahiścakravāḍaḥ sapta haimāḥ sa āyasaḥ //
ābhyantaraḥ samudro 'sau triguṇaḥ sa tu pārśvataḥ /
lakṣatrayaṃ sahasrāṇi viṃśatirdve ca tatra tu /
sārdhe dve madhyamasya aṣṭau caturasraḥ kuruḥ samaḥ //
ṣoḍaśāṣṭau sahasrāṇi catvāri dve ca nirgatāḥ //
puraṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma haimaṃ citratalaṃ mṛdu //
tata ūrdhva vimāneṣu devāḥ kāmabhujastu ṣaṭ /
kāmināṃ rūpiṇāṃ tvādau yojanārdhaṃ tataḥ param //
dhanuḥ pañcaśatānyeṣāṃ krośo raṇyaṃ ca tanmatam //
tatkṣaṇaḥ te punaḥ ṣaṣṭirlavaḥ triṃśad guṇottarāḥ //
ekadvitricaturdvīpāḥ na ca dvau saha buddhavat /
divasān sapta māsāṃśca varṣāṇi ca yathākramam //
saptāgninā adbhirekā evaṃ gate 'dbhiḥ saptake punaḥ /

body.p: abhidharmakośabhāṣye lokanirdeśo nāma tṛtīyaṃ kośasthānam samāptamiti /

lg.l: karmajaṃ lokavaicitryaṃ cetanā tatkṛtaṃ ca tat /
na kasyacidahetoḥ syāt hetuḥ syācca vināśakaḥ /
dvigrāhyaṃ syāt na cāṇau tat vāgvijñaptistu vāgdhvaniḥ //
tulyaṃ muneḥ śubhaṃ yāvat nobhayaṃ tu vipākajam //
vijñaptyā tu punaḥ sarve kurvanto madhyayānvitāḥ /
catvāryekaṃ tathā trīṇi smṛtināśo madaśca taiḥ //
tatpalanāt kila proktāḥ mṛdvāditvaṃ yathā manaḥ //
nirvāṇaṃ ceti śaraṇaṃ yo yāti śaraṇatrayam //
kurūṃśca saṃvaro 'pyevaṃ devānāṃ ca nṛṇāṃ trayaḥ //
dṛṣṭadharmaphalaṃ tacca nikāyo hyeka eva saḥ //
guṇakṣetre ca niyataṃ tatpitrorghātakaṃ ca yat //
yā cetanā dvādaśadhā karma kṛṣṇakṣayāya tat //
navame cetanā yā sā kṛṣṇaśuklakṣayāya ca /
samaṃ prāk ca mṛtasyāsti na maulaḥ anyāśrayodayāt /
mithyādṛṣṭiḥ trayo hyatra panthānaḥ sapta karma ca //
anāsravaṃ punaḥ śeṣaṃ tribhiravyākṛtaṃ ca yat /
catvāri dve tathā trīṇi kuśalasya śubhādayaḥ //
avyākṛtasya dve trīṇi trīṇī caite śubhādayaḥ //
śaikṣasya trīṇi śaikṣādyāḥ aśaikṣasya tu karmaṇaḥ //
dharmāḥ śaikṣādikā ekaṃ phalaṃ trīṇyapi ca dvayam /
tābhyāmanyasya śaikṣādyā dve dve pañca phalāni ca //
trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛggheyasya tadādayaḥ /
apraheyasya te tvekaṃ dve catvāri yathākramam /
nākṣepike samāpattī acitte prāptayo na ca //
triṣu dvipeṣvānantarya śaṇḍhā dīnāṃ tu neṣyate /
bhikṣurdṛk carito vṛttī bhinatti anyatra bāliśān /
cakrabhedaḥ sa ca mataḥ jambūdvīpe navādibhiḥ /
bodhisattvaḥ kuto yāvat yato lakṣaṇa karmakṛt /
cintāmayaṃ kalpaśate śeṣa ākṣipate hi tat //
puṇyaṃ kriyātha tadvastu trayaṃ karmapathā yathā //
dātā viśiṣṭaḥ śraddhādyaiḥ satkṛtyādi dadāti ataḥ /
agraṃ muktasya muktāya bodhisattvasya ca aṣṭamam //
sāvadyā nivṛtā hīnāḥ kliṣṭāḥ dharmāḥ śubhāmalāḥ /
māno 'vidyā ca dṛṣṭiśca vicikitsā ca te punaḥ //
vimatiḥ saha tābhiśca yāvidyāveṇikī ca yā //
yena yaḥ saṃprayuktastu sa tasmin saṃprayogataḥ //
ajaiḥ sarvatra śeṣaistu sarvaiḥ sarvatra saṃyutaḥ //
kiṃ vighnaṃ tatkathaṃ nānyat adhvāyogaḥ tathā sataḥ /
upādānāni avidyā tu grāhikā ne ti miśritā //
anye ca ṣaṭkleśamalāḥ māyā śāṭhyaṃ madastathā //
sukhābhyāṃ saṃprayukto hi rāgaḥ dveṣo viparyayāt /
māyā śāṭhyamatho mrakṣo middhaṃ cobhayathā madaḥ /
ekā dvayoḥ kṣaye dve te tathordhvaṃ tisra eva tāḥ //
tisraḥ parijñāḥ ṣaṭ kṣāntiphalaṃ jñānasya śeṣitāḥ //
āryamārgasya sarvāḥ dve laukikasya anvayasya ca /
dharmajñānasya tisrastu ṣaṭ tatpakṣasya pañca ca //
bhāvanāsthaḥ punaḥ ṣaḍibharekayā vā dvayena vā //
ekāṃ dve pañca ṣaṭ kaścijjahātyāpnoti pañca na //
yatra bhinnena tadbuddhiranyāpohe dhiyā ca tat /
kāmāśrayā na bāhyānām ṣaḍ vidhā gaṇanādibhiḥ //
naiḥṣyandikau nādhareṇa lakṣyete manasā ca tau //
tebhyaḥ kṣāntiḥ dvidhā tadvat kṣāntyā dharmeṇa vardhanam //
ādye dve parihāṇyā ca maulestatraiva satyadṛk /
śiṣyagotrā nnivartya dve buddhaḥ syāt trīṇyapītaraḥ //
ṣoḍaśe tu phalasthau tau yatra yaḥ pratipannakaḥ /
navaprakārā doṣā hi bhūmau bhūmau tathā guṇāḥ /
kāme trayāptiḥ antyasya triṣu nordhva hi dṛkpathaḥ /
antyā śāsturakopyasya madhyā cānyasya tu tridhā //
mriyate na phalabhraṣṭaḥ tadakārya karoti na /
aśaikṣo nava niśritya bhūmīḥ śaikṣastu ṣaṭ yataḥ //
dvau buddhau śrāvakāḥ sapta navaite navadhendriyāḥ //
pudgalāḥ sapta ṣaṭ tvete dvau dvau mārgatraye yataḥ //
śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā samādhiḥ prītyupekṣaṇe /
bhāvane darśane caiva sapta vargā yathākramam //
mārgaśca dravyatastu dve śraddhā śīlaṃ ca nirmalāḥ /
noktā vimuktiḥ śaikṣāṅgaṃ baddhatvāt sā punardvidhā //
sāṅgaḥ saiva vimuktī dve jñānaṃ bodhiryathoditā //

body.p: abhidharmakośe mārgapudgalanirdeśo nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti //

lg.l: tadanyobhayathāryā dhīḥ anyā jñānaṃ dṛśaśca ṣaṭ //
te eva satyabhedena catvāri ete caturvidhe /
tathā ca sāṃvṛtaṃ svaiḥ svaiḥ satyākāraiścatuṣṭayam //
dharmākhyaṃ ṣaṭsu navasu tvanvayākhyaṃ tathaiva ṣaṭ //
caturṇāṃ daśa naikasya yojyā dharmāḥ punardaśa //
ṣoḍaśe ṣaṭ sarāgasya vītarāgasya sapta tu /
navānāṃ tu kṣayajñāne akopyasya daśa bhāvanā /
sthānāsthāne daśa jñānāni aṣṭau karmaphale nava //
daśa vā saṃvṛtijñānaṃ dvayoḥ ṣaṭ daśa vā kṣaye //
tathaiva praṇidhijñānaṃ sarvālambaṃ tu tat tathā /
daśa ṣaḍvārthasaṃvit sā sarvatra anye tu sāṃvṛtam //
iṣṭe śaikṣasya nokte tu vidye sāvidyasaṃtateḥ //
ādyā tṛtīyā ṣaṣṭhī ca prātihāryāṇi śāsanam /
ṛddhiḥ samādhiḥ gamanaṃ nirmāṇaṃ ca gatistridhā /
yathākramaṃ dhyānaphalaṃ dve yāvat pañca nordhvajam /
cetojñānaṃ tu tattredhā tarkavidyākṛtaṃ ca yat /
tṛtīye pañca tūpekṣā smṛtiḥ prajñā sukhaṃ sthitiḥ /
dravyato daśa caikaṃ ca prasrabdhi sukhamādyayoḥ /
vitarkacārau śvāsau ca sukhādi ca catuṣṭayam //
utpadyate tathā śuddhāt kliṭaṃ cāpi svabhūmikam //
kliṣṭāt svaṃ śuddakaṃ kliṣṭaṃ evaṃ cādharaśuddhakam /
cyutau tu śuddhakāt kliṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ kliṣṭāttu nottaram //
dve trīṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca hāna bhāgādyanantaram /
ārya cādyaṃ tridhā kecit atarka dhyānamantaram //
dhyānayormuditā anyāni ṣaṭ su kecittu pañcasu /
na taiḥ prahāṇaṃ nṛṣveva janyante tryanvito dhruvam //
daśa kṛtsnāni alobhāṣṭau dhyāne 'ntye gocaraḥ punaḥ /
dhyānānāṃ rūpadhātau tu tābhyāṃ dharmatayāpi ca //
nimīlite śāstari lokacakṣuṣi kṣayaṃ gate sākṣijane ca bhūyasā /
gate 'tha śāntiṃ paramāṃ svayaṃbhuvi svayaṃbhuvaḥ śāsanadhūrdhareṣu ca /
balakālaṃ malānāṃ ca na pramādyaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ //
